title: National debt in the US in relation to gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2024
yAxis: National debt in relation to GDP
summary: Overall National debt in relation to GDP has increased over the Year.
National debt in relation to GDP is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2021.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2020 and 2021.
The highest National debt in relation to GDP, of value 109.99 was reached at Year 2021
Minimum National debt in relation to GDP about 106.22 was reached at Year 2019
min_summary: In general National debt in relation to GDP has stayed the same over the Year.
National debt in relation to GDP is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2021.
